snippet.title: Tobe's Vertical Adventure
snippet.description:
The game is a platformer set for Xbox Live Indie Games, a simple platformer with a simple twist (it should be obvious enough from the clip :)

In the game, player will face some retro platform puzzles similar to those you see in mario, sonic, megaman, etc... except that the player have a few different "moves", like rolling, wall run, wall jump, etc. There's also 2 items (rope and balloon), both to help him reach odd places in the game.

The game will be completed, hopfully by the end of the month, so for everyone looking at this, help me pimp this game!

Oh, and btw, the video was captured with a cranky software(hence the frame rate), so if anyone knows a better one, do recommend.

And if you like the game, you might be interested to see more of what I do at rayteoactive.wordpress.com

You know you want to ;)
